test_case.title: Verify Valspar Championship Elements on PGA Tour Leaderboard Page (Mac OS)
pre_condition: User has a 16-inch Mac laptop running macOS Sonoma version 14.2.1 or later
User has Google Chrome browser installed, version at least 123.0.6312.58 or later

steps.action: The user navigates to the PGA Tour website: https://www.pgatour.com/
steps.expected_result: The PGA Tour website homepage loads successfully.

steps.action: The user clicks on the 'Leaderboard' button
steps.expected_result: The leaderboard page opens with the URL https://www.pgatour.com/leaderboard

steps.action: The user verifies the presence of the round image with the name of the current tournament on the left side.
steps.expected_result: The round image with the current tournament name is displayed correctly on the left side.

steps.action: The user verifies the presence of the 'OFFICIAL' text inside the green box on the left side.
steps.expected_result: The 'OFFICIAL' text inside the green box is visible on the left side.

steps.action: The user verifies the presence of the text 'Valspar Championship' on the left-middle side.
steps.expected_result: The 'Valspar Championship' text is correctly positioned on the left-middle side.

steps.action: The user verifies the dynamic text 'INNISBROOK RESORT (COPPERHEAD COURSE)' highlighted in grey color, including the city, state, country, and date of the tournament, below the 'Valspar Championship' text.
steps.expected_result: The dynamic text 'INNISBROOK RESORT (COPPERHEAD COURSE)' highlighted in grey color, including the city, state, country, and date of the tournament is displayed accurately below the 'Valspar Championship' text.

steps.action: The user verifies that the horizontal separator line is displayed below.
steps.expected_result: The horizontal separator line is displayed below.

steps.action: The user verifies that the button with hyperlink 'Website' with the arrow ↗︎ on the left side is displayed.
steps.expected_result: The button with hyperlink 'Website' with the arrow ↗︎ on the left side is displayed.
